title: Artscape canceled, fate of city's 4th of July celebrations unknown
body: Baltimore City's most popular summer arts festival, Artscape, has been canceled for the 2021 season due to ongoing COVID-19 health concerns. The fate of the city's July 4 celebrations is still up in the air."We are disappointed to cancel Artscape again this year, but the health and safety of Baltimore citizens is our primary concern. We look forward to celebrating together as a city next summer once it is safe to do so," said Donna Drew Sawyer, CEO of the Baltimore Office of Promotion & The
